availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas W. Turner (Simpson Co. KY, laborer, student)

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, laborer and student. Kentucky native. Son of John Turner and Elizabeth "Betty" A. Turner. Student and laborer in Simpson County, Kentucky, in 1860. Household owned seven enslaved persons in Simpson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 22.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 298A-B.
Find A Grave, "Thomas William Turner (12 Apr 1842-20 Nov 1903)," Memorial #31101613, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/31101613 (accessed September 21, 2020).
